definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
at first/suddenly/abruptly/to spread/(of hair) to stand on end/bristling
to work/(of a machine) to operate/job/work/task/CL:個|个[ge4],份[fen4],項|项[xiang4]
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
to cooperate/to collaborate/to work together/cooperation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to act on/to affect/action/function/activity/impact/result/effect/purpose/intent/to play a role/corresponds to English -ity, -ism, -ization/CL:個|个[ge4]
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Chapters III and IV make a specific analysis of the international outlook of Fei Xiaotong.
sentences.chinese: 第三章和第四章对费孝通的国际观内涵作具体解析。

sentences.english: Too many magazines like to feature sleek models on the cover.
sentences.chinese: 太多的杂志喜欢用时尚模特儿作封面。

sentences.english: The sweater is ornamented with jeweled embroideries.
sentences.chinese: 这件毛衣用镶宝石的刺绣作装饰。

sentences.english: The court recorded a plea of not guilty.
sentences.chinese: 法院对无罪抗辩作了记载。

sentences.english: China may soon make a big contribution to the bank's intellectual ranks.
sentences.chinese: 中国可能很快就会为世行的学者队伍作一个大贡献。

sentences.english: Novel target biotherapy for lung ca ncer is prospected.
sentences.chinese: 并对新的生物靶向治疗作了展望。

sentences.english: The equipartition law of energy is also briefly demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 同时，对能均分原理也作了简洁的论证。

sentences.english: I've spent my entire adult life doing battle with this idea.
sentences.chinese: 整个成年生活我都在和这个想法作斗争。

sentences.english: After making some simplifying assumptions, this paper obtains the fatigue life of steel towers.
sentences.chinese: 在作了一些简化假设后，得到了钢塔架疲劳寿命。

sentences.english: Many of the Parsee merchants have made great fortunes there by dealing in cotton;
sentences.chinese: 很多帕西商人在印度作棉花生意发了大财。

sentences.english: In concrete construction, improvement is made to traditional suspension crossing structure.
sentences.chinese: 在具体施工中，对传统悬索跨越结构作了改进。

sentences.english: He slaughtered the ox and the ram as the fellowship offering for the people.
sentences.chinese: 亚伦宰了那给百姓作平安祭的公牛和公绵羊。

sentences.english: Process flow of olefin conversion unit is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 对烯烃转换工艺技术作了介绍。

sentences.english: I'm confused. Should I go to an optometrist or ophthalmologist for my eye exam?
sentences.chinese: 我应该看验光师还是眼科医师，作眼镜查抄时？

sentences.english: She will give a touching valediction at graduation.
sentences.chinese: 她将在毕业典礼作感人的告别演讲。

sentences.english: He was interviewed during his visit to Japan this week.
sentences.chinese: 是趁著前两天金范来日时，额外作的访谈。

definition: to conduct oneself/same as 做人
